duplicate.title: Duplicate
duplicate.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {count} files?
duplicate.exactTooltip: Only find files that are completely identical.
duplicate.perceptualTooltip: Also detect images that look the same even if the files are different.

duplicate.title: Find duplicates
duplicate.description: Scan folders to locate duplicate images and free up storage space.

import.title: Import images
import.description: Add new images and organize your collection. You can also drag files here.
